title: UAL appoints Brett Hart as acting CEO
text:
UAL appoints Brett Hart as acting CEO 3 Hours Ago CNBC's Phil LeBeau reports on United's interim boss after CEO Oscar Munoz suffered a heart attack last week. Please enter a valid email address Submit To learn more about how we use your information, please read our Privacy Policy
